item.description: Graduate Research Assistant September 2018 - May 2019 (9 months) Worked on cursor detection and tracking in Adobe Photoshop videos, in collaboration with Adobe Research. Implemented a fully unsupervised method that incorporated adaptive video-based cursor discovery; multi-scale template matching; and optimal path search to locate the highest scoring cursor trajectory...
